name: Angel Names Generator
description: Unleash your inner seraphim! This generator crafts divine, ethereal names perfect for characters, projects, or just a touch of heavenly inspiration. Prepare to be blessed with celestial nomenclature!
introduction: Ever felt like your name just...lacks a certain *je ne sais quoi*? Like it's missing that touch of the divine? Well, fret no more! Our Angel Names Generator is here to sprinkle some celestial stardust on your naming woes. Whether you're writing a fantasy novel, creating a character for your next D&D campaign, or simply looking for a name that sounds like it belongs on a Renaissance painting, we've got you covered. Get ready to ascend to naming nirvana!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's like asking the heavens for a suggestion!
Don't like the first result? Keep clicking! The angels have endless inspiration.
Feeling creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own unique angelic moniker.
Share your favorite angel names with your friends. Spread the celestial joy!
Pro-tip: Close your eyes and make a wish before generating. It might help...or it might not. But hey, it can't hurt!

faqs.question: Are these names actually from angels?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee direct communication with the celestial realm (yet!), these names are inspired by angelic lore, mythology, and general vibes of pure awesomeness.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my business/band/pet?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Go forth and bestow these divine names upon your creations. Just promise us you'll use your newfound celestial power for good.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep generating! The beauty of randomness is that eventually, you'll find something that resonates with your soul. Or, you know, just try a different name generator. We won't be offended...much.

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's as free as the air the angels breathe! (Although they probably breathe something fancier, like pure light or distilled ambrosia.)

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and we'll consider adding them to our ever-expanding celestial lexicon.

faqs.question: Are the names gender neutral?
faqs.answer: The names generated can be used for any gender, feel free to use the name that resonates with you the most!
